name: Only Real Landers
description:
Land spaceships in this simulator. What does it consist of: In this game you have to land spaceships on the moon using levers and buttons How to play:
  • The lever on the left can be moved with the mouse, it rotates the ship
  • the stick on the right can be moved with the mouse and this controls the power of the motor
  • The button on the left can be pressed with the mouse and this turns the button on or off
This simulator is not exact: the weight of the ship, the gravity or the power of the engine were configured to be unrealistic fun. What does this game have?It has 3 levels
